text: Equinor ASA (formerly Statoil and StatoilHydro) is a Norwegian state-owned multinational energy company headquartered in Stavanger. They are a petroleum company. They work in 36 countries. In the 2020 Forbes Global 2000, Equinor was ranked as the 169th-largest public company in the world. The company has about 20,200 employees. ==References== Category:Companies of Norway Category:Stavanger Category:Petrol companies Category:State-owned enterprises
title: Equinor
